description: Imagine this Fantastic corner unit, 3 large bedroom, 3 bathroom + den/office!The over sized windows,9-foot ceilings on the main floor and 14-foot celling in the Master Bedroom, generating a cozy atmosphere.The kitchen comes with stainless steel appliances, a wall oven, quartz counters, a huge waterfall island with a gas cooktop. Outside on the main floor you'll find a large patio with a natural gas connection for your BBQ. The big backyard providing space for growing vegetables and flowers or offering recreational space. Property also offers an alarm system, upgraded appliances, central vacuum,oversized tandem garage, waterless tank garburator. Bose farm forest across from the complex, close to Cloverdale Athletic Park, Northview Golf Course, McLellan Elementary SchOOL. JUST call!
